mapper.select: SELECT m.name memberName, m.phone, rr.card_name cardName, rr.reserve_nums reserveNumbers, (SELECT c.times_cost FROM t_course c JOIN t_schedule_record sr on c.id = sr.course_id where sr.id = #{scheduleId}) as timesCost, rr.last_modify_time operateTime, rr.operator, rr.note reserveNote, rr.status reserveStatus, rr.id reserveId FROM t_reservation_record rr JOIN t_member m ON m.id = rr.member_id WHERE rr.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} AND m.is_deleted = 0

SELECT c.name courseName, rr.create_time reserveTime, rr.card_name cardName, rr.reserve_nums reserveNumbers, c.times_cost timesCost, rr.last_modify_time operateTime, rr.operator, rr.note reserveNote, rr.status reserveStatus FROM t_reservation_record rr join t_schedule_record sr on sr.id = rr.schedule_id join t_course c on c.id = sr.course_id
